Container.Name: garage-s3-simple
Container.Overview:
EN Garage is a distributed object storage system that is lightweight, self‑hostable, and compatible with Amazon’s S3 API, designed to replicate data across multiple nodes and locations for resilience while remaining simple to deploy and operate.
FR Garage est un logiciel de stockage d’objets distribué, léger et auto‑hébergeable, compatible avec l’API S3 d’Amazon, conçu pour répliquer les données sur plusieurs nœuds et sites pour la résilience tout en restant simple à déployer et à opérer.

Config.Name: /meta
Config.Description: Storage of the metadatas, good benefits on pool.

Config.Name: /data
Config.Description: Warning: This directory will contain the S3 data to be stored. Make sure you have enough space. You can point directly to a /mnt/diskX if you want a storage limit.

Config.Name: RPC between nodes
Config.Description: Port for distributed data between nodes.

Config.Name: S3 web interface
Config.Description: S3 web port for website bucket

Config.Name: Admin API
Config.Description: Admin API port if you use garage WebUI container.

Config.Name: RPC_SECRET
Config.Description: Auto-generated in first boot on your garage.toml but set it up after that here.

Config.Name: CONSISTENCY_MODE
Config.Description: Can be consistent, degraded or dangerous. RTFM

Config.Name: ADMIN_TOKEN
Config.Description: If you use WebUI garage container for example it is needed.
